title: ISIS Threat Is 'Extremely Worrying' Says Counter-Insurgency Expert
teaser: A decade after the U.S. took control of Fallujah, America is at war again. NPR's Rachel Martin talks with former Lt. Col. John Nagl, whose counter-insurgency manual helped shape U.S. strategy in Iraq.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
